Modernize the Army

Our empire is being exploited by her more advanced neighbors as a result of her inferior army. We should invest our time into evaluating our current military position and search where we can improve. This would greatly help us in standing up to the aggressors and securing our position. Arrival of the Shirley Brothers

Great Ruler! Two foreigners known as the "Shirley Brothers" have arrived at our court offering us their services. They claim that they are able to improve our military might by implementing advanced technology from their lands. Should we accept their offer?[NEWLINE]
Accept the gracious offer.
Lies! Our military is the greatest there is!
Turn them away. They will only waste our resources.

Crown Prince Conspiracy

Great Shah! A source has broken silence on a very intriguing news. It appears that your favoured son has been plotting a horrible plan in the last months. His goal was to murder you and take your place as the ruler of our great empire. What will you do?[NEWLINE]
My son? All I see is a treacherous dead man.
He is still my son, but he deserves imprisonment.
So what? He is my son and I love him no matter what.

Qizilbash Secession

Leader, I am saddened to inform you that our results in military actions have been dropping. The cause for this is considered to be the useless Qizilbash. These once great warriors are nothing more than a burden for us. How should we handle this situation?[NEWLINE]
Remove them from their positions of power, they are a curse.
We should equip them with better arms.
Keep them as they are, for they made this great empire.
